bibl.title: From Alexandria to Babylon. Near Eastern Languages and Hellenistic Erudition in the Oxyrhynchus Glossary (P. Oxy. 1802 + 4812). (Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 4.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XV, 1802 (= M.-P.3 2127; LDAB 5091). - Preface. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Manuscript. - 3. Content. - 4. Dating and Origin. - 5. Near Eastern Glosses and the Problem of Their Acquisition. - 6. The Oxyrhynchus Glossary and Greek Glossography. - 7. Authorship. - 8. Edition. - 9. Commentary. - 10. Conclusions. - Old and New Numeration of the Oxyrhynchus Glossary. Fragments. Bibliography. Indices.
